title: Two Whats?! And A Wow! - Adaptation Station
description:
Oh no! The heater is broken at the Two What's and A Wow studios! The show must go on! This round we've got the questions and answers for you about adaptations!! It's up to you to find the what from the WOW!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
